title: Pidcock and Alaphilippe Secure Invites to the Ardennes – But Will Tudor and Q36.5 Make the Tour de France?
content:
Chasing golden tickets: Audacious newbie ProTeams receive wildcards for Flèche and Liège as tension mounts ahead of must-have Tour de France invites.

Read the full article at Pidcock and Alaphilippe Secure Invites to the Ardennes – But Will Tudor and Q36.5 Make the Tour de France? on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
